SELECT wms_store.store_id storeId, wms_store.`name` name FROM perception_hcs , device_manage , wms_store WHERE perception_hcs.device_id = device_manage.device_id AND device_manage.store_id = wms_store.store_id GROUP BY wms_store.store_id

SELECT dm.store_id, ph.device_id, ph.temperature, ph.humidity, DATE_FORMAT (ph.collect_date, '%h') time FROM perception_hcs ph LEFT JOIN device_manage dm ON ph.device_id = dm.device_id WHERE 1=1
AND str_to_date(ph.collect_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = str_to_date(#{time}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND dm.store_id =#{store}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ph.collect_date, '%h')
